types.Follow: ID int, FollowerID int, FollowedID int, CreatedAt time.Time
types.Feed: UserID int, PostID int, CreatedAt time.Time, Post *Post
types.Notification: ID int, UserID int, Type string, ActorID *int, PostID *int, Data map[string]interface{}, IsRead bool, CreatedAt time.Time, Actor *User, Post *Post
types.Like: ID int, UserID int, PostID int, CreatedAt time.Time, IsActive bool
types.Comment: ID int, PostID int, UserID int, ParentCommentID *int, Content string, LikeCount int, ReplyCount int, ThreadPath string, Depth int, CreatedAt time.Time, UpdatedAt time.Time, IsDeleted bool, Author *User
types.SearchResult: type string, item object, score float, highlights array, timestamp Date
types.TrendingItem: id string, type string, content string, score float, velocity float, metadata object, calculatedAt Date
types.Job: ID string, Type string, Data map[string]interface{}, Priority int, Retry int, MaxRetry int, Created time.Time
types.RedisCache: Redis client wrapper with TTL management
types.DB: Database wrapper with sharding and optimization
types.CircuitBreaker: manages service failure detection and recovery
types.TestDatabase: testing database wrapper with setup/cleanup methods
types.FeatureStore: onlineStore Redis, offlineStore PostgreSQL, streamProcessor KafkaConsumer
types.RecommendationEngine: features FeatureStore, models ModelRegistry, abTesting ABTestingFramework
types.VideoProcessor: jobQueue JobQueue, storage CloudStorage, transcoder FFmpegCluster
types.ImageProcessor: sharp SharpProcessor, formatDetector BrowserCapabilityDetector, storage CloudStorage
types.GlobalDataManager: partitionMap GeographicPartitionMap, crossRegionSync EventualConsistencyManager, migrationCoordinator DataMigrationCoordinator
types.HyperscaleEventProcessor: eventStream DistributedCommitLog, streamProcessor StreamProcessingCluster, eventStore TieredEventStorage

methods.fanOutOnWrite(): distribute content to follower feeds immediately
methods.fanOutOnRead(): assemble feeds by querying followed users at read time
methods.hybridFanOut(): combination approach based on user follower count
methods.Connect(config Config) (*DB, error): establishes database connection with connection pooling
methods.InvalidatePattern(ctx, pattern): removes all cache keys matching pattern
methods.createUser(userData): create new user profile with validation
methods.updateProfile(userId, updates, currentVe: update profile with optimistic concurrency control
methods.followUser(followerId, followedId): atomic follow operation with count updates
methods.getFollowers(userId, cursor, limit, view: paginated follower list with privacy controls
methods.createPost(userData): create new post with validation and fan-out
methods.getFeedForUser(userId, cursor, limit): retrieve paginated user feed with fallbacks
methods.toggleLike(userID int, postID int) (wasL: atomically toggles like status and returns new state
methods.getLikeStatus(userID int, postID int) (i: checks current like status for user-post pair
methods.createComment(postID int, userID int, co: creates new comment with proper threading
methods.getCommentReplies(commentID int, sortBy: gets direct replies to a comment
methods.queueUpdate(postID, updateType, delta): aggregates interaction events and schedules broadcast
methods.flushUpdates(): sends accumulated updates to all subscribed clients
methods.subscribe(clientConnection, postIDs): subscribes client to updates for specific posts
methods.searchUsers(query, searcherUserId, optio: search users with privacy filtering and relevance scoring
methods.getUserSuggestions(partialQuery, limit): get autocomplete suggestions for user search
methods.calculateTrendingHashtags(limit): compute trending hashtags based on velocity scoring
methods.detectTrendingManipulation(hashtagData,: identify and filter trending manipulation attempts
methods.recommendUsers(userId, limit): generate user follow recommendations using hybrid approach
methods.recommendContent(userId, cursor, limit): create personalized content recommendations for explore feed
methods.getColdStartRecommendations(userId, sele: handle recommendations for new users with minimal history
methods.toggleLike(userID, postID): atomically toggles like status and returns new state
methods.getFeatures(userId, featureGroups): retrieve features for ML model serving
methods.computeUserFeatures(userId, activityWind: aggregate user behavior into feature vectors
methods.generateFeedRecommendations(userId, cand: rank content using ML models with diversity constraints
methods.processVideo(uploadedFile, userId, postI: transcode and optimize video for adaptive streaming
methods.processImage(uploadedFile, userId, postI: generate responsive images with format optimization
methods.determineDataLocation(userId, socialGrap: assign user partition based on geography and connections
methods.migrateUserData(userId, fromPartition, t: move user data between geographic regions
methods.processEventStream(eventType, eventData,: handle high-volume event processing with replication

constants.CELEBRITY_THRESHOLD: follower count for algorithm strategy switching

terms.fan-out on write: pre-computing feeds when content is created
terms.fan-out on read: assembling feeds when user requests them
terms.celebrity problem: scaling challenge when users have millions of followers
terms.message runners: systems that distribute content to user feeds
terms.bulletin board: user profile where content is posted
terms.mailbox: personalized feed containing content from followed users
terms.cursor pagination: stable pagination using timestamps and IDs rather than offsets
terms.materialized path: storing full path from root to each comment as string for efficient tree queries
terms.optimistic updates: immediately reflecting user actions in interface while confirming asynchronously
terms.update storm: overwhelming burst of real-time updates during viral content activity
terms.thread path: hierarchical path string enabling efficient comment tree operations
terms.notification system: digital postal service for social activities
terms.batch window: time period for accumulating similar events
terms.town directory: search system for finding specific users or content
terms.community bulletin boards: discovery features surfacing popular conversations and trends
terms.topic pulse monitor: hashtag trending system tracking conversation momentum
terms.cold start problem: difficulty generating recommendations for users without history
terms.user similarity graph: analysis of user connections and behavior patterns
terms.explore feed: algorithmically curated content from across the network
terms.filter bubbles: echo chambers created by over-personalized recommendations
terms.recommendation fatigue: user disengagement from repetitive or irrelevant suggestions
terms.bulkhead pattern: resource isolation to prevent failure spread
terms.load testing: simulating realistic user behavior at scale
terms.viral content: rapidly spreading posts that stress system capacity
terms.cache hit rate: percentage of requests served from cache vs database
terms.N+1 query: performance problem where N items require N+1 database queries
terms.cache stampede: many requests simultaneously trying to rebuild same cached data
terms.correlation ID: unique identifier that traces user actions through distributed operations
terms.cache invalidation cascades: single change requiring cache updates across social graph
terms.machine learning recommendations: algorithmic content and user suggestions based on behavior analysis
terms.content ranking: algorithmic feed ordering optimizing for engagement and diversity
terms.adaptive bitrate streaming: video delivery adjusting quality based on network conditions
terms.polyglot persistence: using specialized databases for different data types
terms.feature store: centralized repository for machine learning features
terms.geographic partitioning: data distribution based on user location for compliance and performance
terms.event streaming: high-throughput distributed event processing for real-time updates
terms.hyperscale: architecture patterns for hundreds of millions of users
terms.hot partition: popular content overwhelming single database shard
